channel.title: Stanley Solutions Blog - Audio
channel.description: Engineering and creativity - all under one hat.

item.title: Using Pipewire Link to Bridge the Gaps
item.description: I'm ready to manage my audio "wiring" a bit more virtually, these days, and I'm ready to do that with some of the cool new tools available in Linux. Luckily for me, Pipewire has some command-line applications that make doing that an absolute cinch! And what's better, I can do it from Python, and make it a little more automagic. Now THAT's what I'm talking about!
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley

item.title: I'm Giving Up on Low-Level Audio in Linux
item.description: I'm so fed up with low-level audio in Linux. It's a constant struggle, and I'm throwing in the towel. I'm done.
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley

item.title: Installing VBAN on Linux Systems with Pipewire
item.description: I recently decided to drop Windows (finally), and move to Linux, full-time. But that means moving to Pipewire; which is both exciting and slightly daugnting. You see, to make the move, I need to get VBAN working on Linux, and talking to Pipewire. Hmm. Time to do some digging...
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley

item.title: Just Some Thoghts on a Song
item.description: Some songs have a hidden meaning, and one song that I really enjoy has something hidden so deeply, I just love it!
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley

item.title: Tech Podcasts Galore!
item.description: Everyone's got their new favorite podcast these days. So here, let me list all of my favorites!
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley
